page.title: 12GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: MANY CHILDREN'S GAMES ARE SEASONAL,HERE ARE A SELECTION OF GAMES ALONG WITH THE MONTH(S) THEY ARE PLAYED IN. JANUARY :{TOUCH WOOD,TOUCH IRON, BLIND {MAN'S TIG FEBRUARY:{DONKEY,QUEENIE,BALL IN THE {CAP,DUCK AT THE TABLE MARCH :{HOPSCOTCH,MIMING GAMES,TOPS {AND GADGETS APRIL :{SKIPPING GAMES, SWINGING GAMES MAY :{MARRIAGE AND COURTSHIP JUNE :{LONDON BRIDGE,ORANGES & {LEMONS, HERE ARE THE ROBBERS PASSING {BY JULY :THEME GAMES - {BIRDS, FLOWERS, {ANIMALS AUGUST :{DEATH & BURIAL, JENNEY JONES SEPTEMBER :{BALL IN THE DECKER OCTOBER :{TIT-TAT-TOE,BOB,APPLE,HUNT {THE SLIPPER { }
